Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

We had high hopes for you, {STR_LeaderName}, yet you defy all that the noble Paragon stand for.[br/][br/]So be it. Our righteous augmented legions will cleanse this planet of both your kind and these Voidbringers.
我们对你寄予了厚望，{STR_LeaderName}。然而你却藐视所有高尚显贵的完人。[br/][br/]。那就这样吧，我们正义的强化军团将把你们和虚空使者从这个星球上一同抹去。
Your honorable military conduct is approved by the Prefect, noble {STR_LeaderName}. Let us conduct our business swiftly; the darkness encroaches ever nearer.
你光荣的军事行为得到了完人星长的认可，高贵的{STR_LeaderName}。让我们迅速开展业务吧；黑暗正在逼近。
The Prefect is the Paragon leader

{STR_LeaderName}, open your eyes and see reason. Great emperors know when it’s time to end unnecessary conflicts in light of a greater threat.[br/][br/]Turn your weapons away from the Star Union heirs and join us in our fight against these denizens from the Void.
{STR_LeaderName}，擦亮你的眼睛，认清事情的缘由。伟大的帝皇们知道当面临更大的威胁时，应该结束不必要的冲突。[br/][br/]停止用你的武器指向星际联盟的继承者，加入我们，对抗来自虚空的入侵。

Your lack of loyalty to the Paragon has become clear. You had a chance to join civilization, yet you have surrendered yourself to the Voidbringers.[br/][br/]In the name of the Prefect, we renounce you. Our forces will meet on the battlefield, {STR_LeaderName}.
你对完人的背叛已无可辩驳。你曾有机会加入文明的一方，但却屈服于虚空使者。[br/][br/]我们以完人星长的名义与你断绝关系。下次再见便是战场，{STR_LeaderName}。
There is little time for formalities, citizen {STR_LeaderName}. Your service to the Paragon will be recognized if you continue this noble fight against the Voidbringers.
没时间讲究礼节了，公民{STR_LeaderName}。如果你继续高尚地抗击虚空使者，你对完人的贡献将会得到认可。

Your past transgressions can still be forgiven, {STR_LeaderName}.[br/][br/]Prove yourself worthy of becoming an ally of the Paragon. In these dark times, will you join us and fight off the uncivilized hordes from the Void?
你过去的罪行仍然可以得到宽恕，{STR_LeaderName}。[br/][br/]证明自己有资格成为完人的同盟。在这黑暗的时代，你是否会加入我们的行列，共同击退来自虚空的野蛮之辈？

The vulture with delusions of grandeur shows their true nature.[br/[br/]Do you really think your alliance with these demons will end well for you? The Paragon cleanse their hands of your barbaric ways.
痴心妄想的秃鹫终于露出了本性。[br/[br/]你真的以为与这些恶魔结盟会为你带来好的结果？完人将以你们的野蛮方式净化他们的双手。
"Vulture with delusions of grandeur" means that the player is a scavenger, but sees themselves as more important and powerful than they are
Let it be known, we would not be dealing with your aggressive ways were it not necessary. But in these troubled times, the Paragon offer their cooperation even to {STR_LeaderName}, the Warmonger.
开诚布公地说，如果不是迫不得已，我们是不会处理你激进的行事方式的。但在这个多事之秋，就算是{STR_LeaderName}这样的好战者，我们也会伸出橄榄枝。
By the law of the Prefect, we offer you redemption in light of the abhorrent Voidbringers spreading into this system. We will forgive your acts of war against the Paragon if you join us.
可恶的虚空使者在这个星系中不断肆虐，根据完人星长的法令，我们愿意为你伸出救赎之手。如果你加入我们，我们将原谅你对完人发起的战争行为。
For this faction's narrative style and in world references, please check the glossay delivered as part of the documentation.
In the lines below, {STR_LeaderName} is replaced by the name of the player's avatar.

In the lines below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
